name: Morning Routine Item
prompt: Simple, clear icon-style illustration of [ITEM] on white background, friendly style, suitable for visual schedule, minimal details, bright colors
notes: Replace [ITEM] with specific activity like "brushing teeth", "eating breakfast", etc.

name: Transition Activity
prompt: Clean, simple illustration showing [ACTIVITY] for classroom transition, clear and easy to understand, suitable for children, minimal background
notes: For activities like "line up", "sit down", "clean up"

name: Emotion Face - Basic
prompt: Simple, friendly cartoon face showing [EMOTION], clear facial expression, suitable for teaching emotions to children, clean white background, gentle style
notes: Replace [EMOTION] with: happy, sad, angry, scared, surprised, etc.

name: Emotion with Intensity
prompt: Thermometer-style emotion scale showing [EMOTION] from calm to intense, simple cartoon faces at each level, easy to understand, labeled with numbers 1-5
notes: Helps children identify emotion intensity levels

name: Social Story Character
prompt: Friendly, simple cartoon character [DOING ACTION], suitable for social story, clear and encouraging, minimal background, appropriate for children
notes: For sequential social stories. Keep character style consistent.

name: Social Situation Scene
prompt: Simple illustration of [SOCIAL SITUATION] with diverse friendly children, showing appropriate behavior, clear and positive, suitable for teaching social skills
notes: Examples: sharing toys, taking turns, asking for help, joining play

name: Learning Concept
prompt: Clear, simple educational illustration showing [CONCEPT], easy to understand, suitable for children, uncluttered, bright and engaging
notes: For teaching concepts like colors, shapes, numbers, letters

name: Science Diagram
prompt: Educational diagram showing [TOPIC], labeled parts with arrows, simple and clear style, colorful, suitable for elementary students, easy to read labels
notes: Examples: parts of a plant, water cycle, human body systems, solar system

name: Science Experiment Visual
prompt: Simple step-by-step illustration of [EXPERIMENT], clear numbered steps, safe and appropriate for children, bright colors, easy to follow
notes: For demonstrating simple science experiments in classroom

name: Math Number Visual
prompt: Clear illustration showing the number [NUMBER] with counting objects, bright and engaging, objects grouped clearly, suitable for teaching counting
notes: Replace [NUMBER] with 1-20. Objects can be fruits, animals, toys, etc.

name: Math Shapes Poster
prompt: Educational poster showing [SHAPE] with real-world examples, labeled clearly, colorful and engaging, suitable for classroom display
notes: Shapes: circle, square, triangle, rectangle, etc. Include everyday objects

name: Math Operation Visual
prompt: Simple visual showing [OPERATION] with objects, clear and easy to understand, bright colors, suitable for teaching basic math concepts
notes: Operations: addition, subtraction, multiplication, division with visual aids

name: Letter Practice Card
prompt: Large letter [LETTER] with pictures of objects starting with that letter, clear and colorful, simple style, white background, suitable for phonics teaching
notes: Both uppercase and lowercase. Include 3-4 objects per letter

name: Sight Word Visual
prompt: Flashcard showing the word [WORD] in large, clear letters with a simple supporting illustration, bright and engaging, easy to read font
notes: For common sight words. Keep illustration simple and relevant

name: Vocabulary Picture Card
prompt: Clear illustration of [WORD] with the word labeled below, simple and uncluttered, bright colors, suitable for vocabulary building
notes: For building vocabulary with visual associations

name: Reward Star/Badge
prompt: Colorful reward badge or star with [TEXT], encouraging and positive, bright colors, celebratory style, suitable for classroom rewards
notes: Examples: "Great Job!", "Super Star!", "Excellent Work!", "You Did It!"

name: Achievement Certificate
prompt: Friendly certificate design for [ACHIEVEMENT], decorative border, space for name, encouraging and celebratory, colorful and positive
notes: For recognizing specific achievements and milestones

name: Calming Strategy Visual
prompt: Simple, calming illustration demonstrating [STRATEGY], peaceful colors, clear step-by-step if needed, friendly and reassuring style
notes: Examples: deep breathing, counting to 10, safe space, mindfulness exercises

name: Feelings Thermometer
prompt: Visual thermometer showing different feeling levels from calm to overwhelmed, simple faces at each level, color-coded, easy to understand
notes: Helps children identify and communicate their emotional state

name: Life Skills Step-by-Step
prompt: Step-by-step visual guide for [SKILL], numbered clear steps, simple illustrations, encouraging style, easy to follow sequence
notes: Examples: handwashing, tying shoes, packing backpack, getting dressed

name: Safety Rule Visual
prompt: Clear illustration showing [SAFETY RULE], positive and instructive, easy to understand, suitable for classroom display, friendly style
notes: Examples: walking feet, gentle hands, inside voices, safe playground behavior

name: Classroom Rule Poster
prompt: Positive classroom rule poster showing [RULE], encouraging and clear, bright colors, simple illustration of children following the rule
notes: Frame rules positively (what TO do, not what NOT to do)

name: Weather Chart Icon
prompt: Clear, simple icon showing [WEATHER], suitable for weather chart, bold and easy to identify, consistent style, bright colors
notes: Weather types: sunny, cloudy, rainy, snowy, windy, stormy, etc.

name: Days of Week Card
prompt: Visual card for [DAY], clear text with supporting illustration, bright and engaging, suitable for classroom calendar
notes: Include both the day name and a memorable visual association

name: Season Illustration
prompt: Beautiful scene depicting [SEASON], clear seasonal indicators, appropriate weather and activities, engaging and educational, suitable for children
notes: Seasons: spring, summer, fall, winter with typical characteristics

name: Sensory Activity Visual
prompt: Engaging illustration of [SENSORY ACTIVITY], clear and inviting, shows materials and action, safe and appropriate, colorful
notes: Examples: playdough, water play, sand table, sensory bins, texture exploration

name: Choice Board Item
prompt: Simple, clear illustration of [CHOICE] for choice board, icon style, easy to identify, suitable for classroom, white background
notes: For choice boards showing activity options

name: First-Then Board Visual
prompt: Two-part visual showing FIRST [TASK] THEN [REWARD], clear sequence with arrows, simple and motivating, easy to understand
notes: Helps with task completion and transitions. Keep very simple and clear

name: Inclusive Character - Diverse
prompt: Friendly, diverse character illustration showing [CHARACTERISTIC], inclusive representation, warm and welcoming, appropriate for educational materials
notes: Create diverse, inclusive representations of children and families

name: Helpful Adult Figure
prompt: Friendly illustration of [HELPER] in simple, approachable style, diverse representation, kind expression, suitable for teaching about community helpers
notes: Examples: teacher, doctor, firefighter, police officer, librarian, crossing guard
